text: Holopogon smithianus is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Holopogon smithianus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China smithianus Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Holopogon smithianus
